sentences.sContent: "They built up nice little pictures, " says David Villeneuve, program leader of attosecond science at the National Research Council of Canada in Ottawa.
sentences.sContent_eng: "They built up nice little pictures, " says David Villeneuve, program leader of attosecond science at the National Research Council of Canada in Ottawa.
sentences.sCn: “他们制作了漂亮的小图片，”David Villeneuve说，他是在加拿大渥太华的国家研究理事会的阿托秒科学的项目领导。

sentences.sContent: The attosecond X-ray pulses strong field electronic dynamics of both bound and continuum electrons can be characterized by measuring the high energy photoelectron spectra yielded by recollision.
sentences.sContent_eng: The attosecond X-ray pulses strong field electronic dynamics of both bound and continuum electrons can be characterized by measuring the high energy photoelectron spectra yielded by recollision.
sentences.sCn: 通过测量碰撞复合过程中的高能电子的辐射谱可以重构阿秒X光脉冲以及探测强场下束缚态和连续态电子动力学。

trans.tranOther: a unit of time that is equal to 10 to the power of  minus  18
